text: Jukka Rasila (born August 12, 1969) is a Finnish actor and voice actor. ==Selected filmography== ===Anime roles === * Digimon Adventure – Motimon, Tentomon, Kabuterimon, AtlurKabuterimon, Gennai, Andromon, Etemon, MetalEtemon, MetalSeadramon, Mugendramon, Wizarmon, Meramon, DeathMeramon, Additional Voices ===Animated roles=== * Disney's House of Mouse – Donald Duck * DuckTales – Donald Duck * Lilo & Stitch: The Series – Stitch / "Experiment 626" * Quack Pack – Donald Duck * Super Robot Monkey Team Hyperforce Go! – Otto * The Legend of Tarzan – Merkus, Additional Voices * The Powerpuff Girls – Additional Voices ===Film roles=== * A Bug's Life – Slim * Atlantis: The Lost Empire – Gaetan Moliere * Bee Movie – Mooseblood the Mosquito * Help! I'm a Fish – Shark * Lilo & Stitch – Stitch / "Experiment 626" * Lilo & Stitch 2: Stitch Has a Glitch – Stitch / "Experiment 626" * Monsters, Inc. – Additional Voices * Shrek – Donkey * Shrek 2 – Donkey * Shrek the Third – Donkey * Stitch! The Movie – Stitch / "Experiment 626" * The Simpsons Movie – Groundskeeper Willie * Toy Story – Additional Voices Category:Finnish actors Category:1969 births
title: Jukka Rasila
